about_the_game:
Unlock a Champion of your choice, geared up and ready to add to your formation!

In this pack:
- 1 Champion Summoning Scroll which allows you to choose a Champion to unlock and collect 6 Platinum Chests and full Uncommon Equipment for them.
- 5 Epic Potions of Speed
- 5 Potions of Specialization
- 840 Platinum
